sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz';
import { Input } from 'class101-ui';
import FormGroup from './FormGroup';

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"form-group"}}>{`Form Group`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`각종 컨트롤러들을 한 폼으로 묶어줍니다.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={FormGroup} />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-usage"}}>{`Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={1} __code={`<FormGroup label="Label">
  <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
</FormGroup>`} __scope={{props,Input,FormGroup}}>
  <FormGroup label="Label">
    <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
  </FormGroup>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-different-label-colors"}}>{`With different label colors`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={2} __code={`<FormGroup label="Label" labelColor="gray">
  <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
</FormGroup>
<FormGroup label="Label" labelColor="pink">
  <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
</FormGroup>`} __scope={{props,Input,FormGroup}}>
  <FormGroup label="Label" labelColor="gray">
    <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
  </FormGroup>
  <FormGroup label="Label" labelColor="pink">
    <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
  </FormGroup>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"inline-form-group"}}>{`Inline form group`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={3} __code={`<FormGroup label="Label" inline>
  <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
</FormGroup>`} __scope={{props,Input,FormGroup}}>
  <FormGroup label="Label" inline>
    <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
  </FormGroup>
</Playground></MDXTag>
